verbs.description: As NFL owners [V: are] deposed in a suit brought by Colin Kaepernick alleging collusion in the league to keep him from being allowed to play , it ’s coming to light that Donald Trump communicated directly with some owners and told them that he is exploiting the issue for political gain . The revelation came in a sworn …
